mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS boards_num, bd.content AS content, u.name AS user_name, b.created_at, b.updated_at FROM boards b LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN board_detail bd ON b.id = bd.boards_id

SELECT b.id AS boards_num, bd.content AS board_content, u.name AS board_creator_name, c.comment, c.created_at AS comment_created_at, cu.name AS commenter_name FROM boards b LEFT JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN board_detail bd ON b.id = bd.boards_id LEFT JOIN comments c ON bd.boards_id = c.board_detail_id LEFT JOIN users cu ON c.user_id = cu.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
